function: Establish a connection to an external PostgreSQL database using predefined environment variables.
static_description: The backend establishes a secure connection to the PostgreSQL instance using credentials provided via environment variables. It exposes RESTful API endpoints for frontend consumption related to authentication, articles, collections, and user history.

resource_dependency.session_management: JWT-based session handling with tokens stored in HTTP-only cookies

function: Allow new users to register accounts and existing users to log in securely.
static_description: A dedicated authentication module handles user registration and login requests through API endpoints. User credentials are validated against the database, and authenticated sessions use JWT tokens.

resource_dependency.category_icons: Placeholder paths for category icons such as '/icons/startup.png', '/icons/funding.png'

function: Enable users to browse articles organized under distinct categories.
static_description: Articles are displayed in a grid or list view grouped by categories. Each category has an associated icon referenced from its path. Categories are fetched dynamically from the backend.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a category filter updates the displayed article list to show only those belonging to that category.

function: Provide keyword-based search functionality across published articles.
static_description: A search bar is located prominently at the top of the page with a magnifying glass icon. It allows users to enter queries which trigger backend searches returning relevant results.

interaction_and_states.description: Pressing Enter after typing initiates a search request to the backend and displays matching articles.
Clicking the search icon initiates a search request to the backend and displays matching articles.

function: Allow logged-in users to save favorite articles into a personal collection.
static_description: Each article card includes a toggleable heart icon indicating whether it's collected. Icons visually represent the current state – filled when collected, empty otherwise.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggling the heart icon adds/removes the article from the user’s collection via an API call.

resource_dependency.share_endpoints: Social media sharing URLs (e.g., Twitter, LinkedIn)

function: Enable users to share articles externally on social platforms or via direct links.
static_description: Each article features a visible share button represented by a share icon. Clicking this reveals options to distribute the article link on various platforms.

interaction_and_states.description: Opens a modal or dropdown menu listing supported sharing platforms. Choosing one opens a pre-filled share dialog for that platform.

function: Automatically track and store the reading history of logged-in users.
static_description: User activity involving article views is recorded silently in the background without disrupting the UI flow. Data is stored persistently in the database linked to individual user IDs.

function: Offer a centralized dashboard for users to access saved articles and reading history.
static_description: Profile page accessible from navigation shows two sections: 'My Collections' and 'Reading History'. Both sections pull data asynchronously from respective API endpoints.

interaction_and_states.description: Navigating to the profile route loads user-specific collection and history lists retrieved from backend services.

function: Apply consistent styling with specified colors to enhance visual appeal.
static_description: All pages feature an Old Lace (#FDF5E6) background color and Rosy Brown (#BC8F8F) interface elements like buttons, headers, and borders. Typography uses clean, readable sans-serif fonts.

resource_dependency.package_json_structure: { "scripts": { "install:all": "concurrently \"cd client && npm install\" \"cd server && npm install\"", "dev": "concurrently \"cd client && npm run dev\" \"cd server && npm run dev\"" } }

function: Configure package.json scripts for unified setup and development workflow.
static_description: Root-level package.json contains commands to install dependencies for both frontend and backend simultaneously (`install:all`) and start both environments concurrently (`dev`). These scripts utilize the concurrently utility.

resource_dependency.db_schema_definition: Users table: id (PK), username, email, password_hash; Articles table: id (PK), title, content, category_id (FK); Categories table: id (PK), name; Collections table: user_id (FK), article_id (FK); ReadingHistory table: user_id (FK), article_id (FK), read_at

function: Define relational database structure to support application features.
static_description: PostgreSQL database initialized with tables for managing users, articles, categories, user collections, and reading history. Relationships enforce referential integrity among entities.

function: Expose RESTful endpoints enabling full-stack communication between frontend and backend systems.
static_description: Defined set of API routes mapped to controllers handling business logic for user authentication, article browsing/searching, and user-specific actions like saving articles or viewing history.
